name: Edgewood Center for Children and Families
description: At the heart of their approach to youth mental health is a comprehensive, family-centered model that addresses the full spectrum of mental health needs. Young people in crisis need safety and structure to thrive. They offer a continuum of care, from crisis, residential, or outpatient treatment on their San Francisco campus to in-home support and community-based services.
